title: Big Value from Big Data: Product innovation and increased efficiency? You can have it all.
abstract: Big Value from Big Data: Product innovation and increased efficiency – you can have it all… Whether your knowledge product is to sell to outside customers or to meet a mandate of your organization, you still have to be timely, efficient, and innovative in order to succeed. How do you go about making the business use case for a Big Data initiative? How do you take that Big Data all the way through to the outward facing product? Come hear how the American Psychological Association looked at the options for tools, products, and partners, made the decision, wrote the business case, executed the project, and got the first measurement of results. This case study will focus on the search and content delivery aspects of large and complex data.

surveys.comments: Not really about big data but of their project moving to ML
Not really about big data but of their project moving to ML
